task.summary: Added new activity "ConvertActivity" Separated constants from an activity to class "Constants"
Added initial classes for list activity for available currencies.

- added 3 missing images for bitcoin, gold and silver - added functionality to the "settings" menu item to open the list of available currencies - added checkbox to the list item of available currencies - recent rates activity now shows only preferred currencies
- Changed minSdkVersion from 7 to 11 - Added initial version of "CurrencyCursorAdapter" - Added simple drag & drop functionality

MESSAGE.value: Added new activity "ConvertActivity" Separated constants from an activity to class "Constants"
Added initial classes for list activity for available currencies.

- added 3 missing images for bitcoin, gold and silver - added functionality to the "settings" menu item to open the list of available currencies - added checkbox to the list item of available currencies - recent rates activity now shows only preferred currencies
- Changed minSdkVersion from 7 to 11 - Added initial version of "CurrencyCursorAdapter" - Added simple drag & drop functionality
